overview: The evil Lord Zuru in his ever-longing quest to rule the galaxy attempts to control the 5 sex-crazed muses of Ciria. By doing so, Zuru's plan to fuse their powers and create one master power creates an intergalactic hardcore frenzy - that's guaranteed to satisfy the wildest of perversions, in thisâ€¦the ultimate Cosplay Adventure!
title: Show No Mercy
